title: Saved by the Villain
description: Jade Sky is a reporter with a suspicion, and she knows Gray Malice is keeping secrets. There’s something about him she can’t ignore and neither can her body.Gray Malice has always been the bad guy, and now is no different. It’s too bad for Jade he’s set his sights on her… because he’s never letting go.Warning: Come on, who doesn’t love the villain!
author: Alexa Riley
